snippet.title: Artist's body found in beach hole
snippet.content: THE body of a Texas woman was found inside a hole on a beach shortly after going missing during a family holiday. Ashley O'Connor an artist from Plano, Texas, was on holiday in Maryland with her family when she became separated at around 2am (local time) on Monday morning in Ocean City. Police were alerted at about 6:30am (local time) when beachgoers found a body near Second Street and told town employees, Ocean City Communications Manager Jessica Waters confirmed. As the news spread of her death, friends have taken to social media to share updates and mourn their loss. Ms Waters said O'Connor's death appeared to be accidental, but police have not ruled out anything, reports USA Today. Police are reported to have spent hours scouring the beach to clear the scene and look for clues. Originally published as

sindex.name: Ocean City Communications Manager Jessica Waters
